New Records: Yordan Alvarez homered and Kyle Tucker surpassed 100 RBIs, becoming the AL leader
Key Match Events: The Astros scored five runs in the fifth inning to take a 7-4 lead
Ryan Pressly struck out Manny Machado and Xander Bogaerts to preserve the lead
Pre-Game Insights: The Astros discussed the need to improve their home record and focused on their bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dusty Baker praised the team's resilience and Ryan Pressly's key role in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres scored three straight singles in the sixth inning to cut the lead to 7-5
The Astros' bullpen effectively ended the Padres' threats
